entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:19 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -40.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gjoa Haven Airport 03:58 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Haze
Temperature: -40.8°C
Pressure: 100.2 kPa
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -54
Dewpoint: -45.6°C
Wind: NW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 36.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Ice fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h early this morning. High minus 36. Wind chill minus 59 this morning and minus 51 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 39. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 39. Wind chill near minus 54. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
